main event: A group of witnesses, including two adults and three children, observed a glowing round object with bright white light in the center and smaller lights on each side while driving near Centerville, Ohio on March 6, 1968.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately twenty feet in diameter and glowing a bright orange color,The witnesses reported the object hovering at an altitude of 150 to 200 feet for about 2 to 3 minutes,The object made no sound and left no visible trail or exhaust,The sighting lasted a total of approximately four hours,The object moved off to the southwest at high speed before disappearing from view.
sighted object: a glowing round object with bright orange color
witness description: two adults and three children traveling in a car
